detaileddescription.para: To get you up speed as soon as possible, we created a nice little installer script that will set-up your computer in no-time. It will download, install and compile all necessary software and if all goes well, you can start using our robot simulator within 30 minutes. Just do the following:
And run it (Remark: This last step may not work when booting Ubuntu from an USB. Dual booting is thus recommended): source install.bash
That's it! The installer may ask for confirmation a few times because it has to install some programs system wide. Just enter your password, and you'll be good to go!
Head to the next tutorial to set-up your workspace.
